property.name: Cache
property.description: Context.Response.Cache is used to control the cache HTTP headers. See the Microsoft documentation for HttpCachePolicy for more details. Read Only.

property.name: ContentEncoding
property.description: Context.Response.ContentEncoding is used to get or set the content encoding of the response. Read Write.

property.name: ContentType
property.description: Context.Response.ContentType is used to get or set the MIME type of the response content. It defaults to "text/html". Read Write.

property.name: Cookies
property.description: Context.Response.Cookies is the collection of the current response's cookies. Read Only.

property.name: Headers
property.description: Context.Response.Headers is the collection of the current response's HTTP headers. Read Only.

property.name: OutputStream
property.description: Context.Response.OutputStream is the raw contents of the HTTP response content. Read Only.

property.name: RedirectLocation
property.description: Context.Response.RedirectLocation is used to get or set the absolute URI that will be sent in the Location header of the response. Read Write.

property.name: StatusCode
property.description: Context.Response.StatusCode is used to get or set HTTP status code of the response. Read Write.

property.name: StatusDescription
property.description: Context.Response.StatusDescription is used to get or set the description for the StatusCode of the response. Read Write.

method.name: AppendCookie
method.description: Context.Response.AppendCookie(Cookie) adds a cookie to the response's cookie collection. Note: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Return type: V.

method.name: AppendHeader
method.syntax: AppendHeader as V (Name as C, Value as C)

argument.name: Name as C
argument.description: The name of the HTTP header item.

argument.name: Value as C
argument.description: The value of the HTTP header item.

method.description: Context.Response.AppendHeader(Name, Value) adds an HTTP header to the current response. Return type: V
